sanskrit_verse:
इमं हि सर्ववर्णानां पश्यन्तो धर्ममुत्तमम् ।
यतन्ते रक्षितुं भार्यां भर्तारो दुर्बला अपि ॥ ९.६॥
transliteration:
imaṁ hi sarvavarṇānāṁ paśyanto dharmamuttamam |
yatante rakṣituṁ bhāryāṁ bhartāro durbalā api || 9.6||
sph_interpretive_translation: Seeing this highest Dharma for all varnas, even weak husbands strive to protect their wives.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority arises from alignment with Dharma, not physical strength
Causation flows from conscious recognition of universal law
Capacity-based responsibility is activated by dharmic insight
Restoration logic prioritizes relational integrity over individual dominance
Consciousness alignment enables even the weak to fulfill protective duty
executable_legal_axioms: IF a husband recognizes the supreme Dharma of protection THEN his capacity to act is automatically restored regardless of external circumstances
IF a spouse identifies a threat to conjugal harmony THEN automatic invocation of restorative protocols occurs without need for punitive measures
IF any varna member witnesses dharmic duty unmet THEN activation of supportive structures must occur immediately
IF weakness in worldly power is present BUT dharma is seen THEN action follows naturally through consciousness alignment
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, when spousal protection cases arise, the threshold of responsibility lies not in assessing physical capability or social status but in determining whether the husband has accessed the vision of supreme Dharma. The court's role is to restore capacity through alignment, not to assign fault or impose penalties.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa-based causality establishes that seeing the supreme Dharma (pratyakṣa-pramāṇa) directly causes protective action. Anupūrvaśaḥ manifests as: vision of Dharma → awakening of duty → spontaneous activation of capacity. Proportional responsibility is measured by degree of alignment, not worldly power. Non-punitive reality rule confirms that no external enforcement is required when consciousness is properly aligned.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Vision Restoration Protocol: Immediate facilitation of dharmic perception through guided meditation and scriptural alignment
Capacity Activation Process: Invocation of inner strength through connection with cosmic order
Relational Integrity Completion: Re-establishment of protective-consciousness between spouses
Community Support Integration: Automatic engagement of community structures to support dharmic action
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as the Source of Law. Dharma is restored through consciousness alignment. Reality operates without punishment. Consciousness itself is the supreme adjudicator.
